page.title: 13OPINIONS ABOUT EAGLESHAM
page.content: football and netball team who both take part in the primary league. We asked over two hundred local people some questions about the way they feel about the village and here are the answers we got. The first question was,"What do you think is the very best thing about living in Eaglesham." Here are the results.The answers are from the most popular down.The three most popular was the 35 people who said"countryside second was the 20 who said,"the Orry" third was the 13 who said,"quietness." The next question was what is the most serious problem facing Eaglesham? The three most popular was the 36 people who said"heavy traffic" second was the 16 who said"vandalism and violence and third 10 who said "Building in the green belts"The next question was "What will be the most serious future
